cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 21st Oct 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 21st Oct 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: Standard 6 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: These 6-bed dorms offer comfy beds made up with fresh linen. Guests have access to amazing bathrooms with GHDs and hairdryers. Enjoy all on-site facilities, including a huge spa pool and free Wi-Fi, ensuring a convenient and relaxing stay.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: Superior 3 Bed Mixed Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Experience comfort and adventure in our 3-bed shared log cabins at Rainforest Retreat, nestled in the Franz Josef rainforest. Enjoy modern amenities, stunning views, and access to our facilities. Affordable luxury and community atmosphere await. Book now!

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: Standard 4 Bed Mixed Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: These 4-bed dorms feature a private bathroom with complimentary toiletries and a hair dryer. Fresh linen, tea, and coffee are provided. Guests can enjoy on-site facilities, including a hot tub, ensuring a comfortable and relaxing stay.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Twin Room Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Modern studio units set amongst the rainforest, featuring large furnished decks to enjoy the bush setting. The rooms are furnished with either one king bed, or a queen bed with a single, and have a modern bathroom, kitchenette and great forest views.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 21st Oct 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 21st Oct 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
